description:
Add comfort to long days on the trail with the Alpine Carbon Cork Trekking Poles. The soft and moisture-wicking cork grips feel great against skin, and the 100% carbon fibre shafts keep the weight low without sacrificing strength. Secure FlickLock Pro adjustments are made of lightweight forged aluminum that is durable and won't slip.

  • Natural cork grips are warm in your hands, and soft rubber tops are comfortable
  • Wrist straps feature a soft lining bonded to a supportive shell
  • EVA Grip extensions let you shift your grasp without adjusting pole length
  • Includes carbide Tech Tips and low-profile trekking baskets
  • Compatible with powder baskets (sold separately)
name: Black Diamond Alpine Carbon Cork Trek Poles - Unisex
